ygData.subject: Re: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: profits are still to be had in some respects in certain skills - you just have to be willing to do a little work ... like getting your own ores and clays, and
ygData.messageBody:
profits are still to be had in some respects in certain skills - you just
have to be willing to do a little work ... like getting your own ores and
clays, and not buying them from the store. That alone will save you a lot
of money, not a lot of time, but a lot of money. :)
----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Calkins <stretch1@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 10:28 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] Re: Smithing


> From: "Scott Calkins" <stretch1@...>
>
> Someone was asking about smithing skill. If you plan to get into
smithing,
> you will probibly spend around 300-400+ plat to get up to around the 100
> lev. I have not seen any item that can be sold back to npc's for a
profit.
> But when you get up to the lev where you can make banded armor, it is a
item
> that other players will buy at a good profit. Now if they could add in
the
> making of weapons I would be realy happy
>
> Stretch
>
